Alexandria.International Association of Amusement P: The International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (IAAPA) represents nearly 5,000 amusement-industry members in 99 countries worldwide and operates several global amusement-industry trade shows. Its annual IAAPA Attractions Exposition in Orlando, Florida is recognized as the world's largest amusement trade show in the number of attendees and exhibitors and providing members insight into current amusement trends, laws, operations and industry methodology. The IAAPA also helps to promote guest- and ride-safety guidelines in conjunction with ASTM International and assists its members to uphold the highest amusement-industry safety and professional standards.
